description.value:
The extent of the corruption within you does more than simply sap your foes' strength, it devastates their minds and reflexes.

When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Cruelty]{Cruelty}, choose whether you want to make the creature enfeebled as normal, to make it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} on a failed save (clumsy 2 on a critical failure), or to make it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} on a failed save (stupefied 2 on a critical failure).
